button_new_process: Start working on a new file.
app_description: An app dealing with GPS files.
technologies_header: This app was created to test some technologies. These are:
uploader_description: Drag 'n' drop GPX- or FIT-files, or click to select files.
intro_description_list: Upload a single or multiple files in GPX- or FIT-format.
Merge them into a single file.
Download the merged file as GPX or TCX.
optimize_waypoints_tooltip: Waypoints that are closer than 500m to the track will be moved to a point on the track. This can improve readability on some GPS-devices, since these are having problems with points located not directly on the track.
error_backend_server_na: The backend server is not available at the moment. Sorry!
error_not_gps_data: Couldn't process some files. Was it really GPS data?
error_download_failure_sn: The file could not be found on the server. Please upload again!
error_download_failure_pl: The files could not be found on the server. Please upload again!
